and the (new) Big Three

If Celtics coach Doc Rivers had his way, everyone would be back. But he knows better than anyone else that management has broader concerns.

After Tuesday’s vote in Wisconsin, what happens next in traditionally labor-friendly states like Massachusetts is another test for union clout.

There are nagging fears among residents that a Suffolk Downs casino might upset a tenuous balance and knock an up-and-coming community off stride.
